channel.title: First time using VPS
channel.description: Hi, I would like some suggestions on what VPS I should buy, as I've never used one before. I'm not looking for the top notch VPS, as my server is just starting out. I'm running on a Windows system. Any suggestions?

item.title: First time using VPS
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“metal k0, post:5, topic:464827”][quote author=TempahScape link=topic=568964.msg4128903#msg4128903 date=1350823190]

VPS INFORMATION
Operating system Windows Standard 64Bit
Control Panel No CP
CPU cores 1
Memory 2GB
Disk space 50GB
[/quote]

Is Windows Standard the same? It’s the only one I can choose and when I go to check out this is what I get; Windows 2008 R2 Standard[/quote]

It’s got no cpu. Meaning you need to know Putty.

Go to santrex.net. $22 USD and you will have yourself a nice off-shore hosted vps with 24/7 customer support.

Read full topic

item.title: First time using VPS
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

[quote=“TempahScape, post:2, topic:464827”]Hello if you are looking for a cheap vps go to burst.net. if you are looking for a good vps around 20 pounds go to 123-reg.
I am currently on 123-reg and my server is running perfectly with 50 players online at a time. only 25 pounds a month :)[/quote]

Can I maybe ask you how much memory etc you are using on 123-reg, im interested, thanks in advance ;).

Read full topic
